== Spells ==
{{spellbook|Book of Frost}}

==Further reading==
The [[Book of Ice]] has more advanced ice magic.

==History==
*[[0.27]] [[Summon Ice Beast]] and [[Ozocubu's Armour]] were removed from the book. Prior to this version, this was the starting book for [[Ice Elementalist|Ice Elementalists]]. For all classes with magic, starting books were replaced by sets of spells.
*[[0.25]] [[Throw Frost]] and [[Throw Icicle]] were replaced by [[Frozen Ramparts]] and [[Hailstorm]].
*[[0.18]] [[Condensation Shield]] was removed.
*[[0.9]] [[Freezing Cloud]] was replaced by [[Condensation Shield]].
